Running benchmark on uniform join.
For 5 tables: P, R, S, T, U
Repeating 5 times.
With query:
SELECT table_P.key AS key_P, table_P.val AS val_P, table_R.key AS key_R, table_R.val AS val_R, table_S.key AS key_S, table_S.val AS val_S, table_T.key AS key_T, table_T.val AS val_T, table_U.key AS key_U, table_U.val AS val_U FROM table_P, table_R, table_S, table_T, table_U WHERE table_P.val=table_R.key AND table_R.val=table_S.key AND table_S.val=table_T.key AND table_T.val=table_U.key
